notes: All prices in CHF for Sweden Central region. Audio and LLM prices are per MILLION tokens.

blob_storage.note: Hot tier for frequently accessed manual pages. Shared by both voice and email agents.

acs.note: ACS pricing for Swiss geographic numbers and call handling

container_apps.note: Container costs: active rate during calls, flat idle rate (0.0000024) for BOTH vCPU+memory when min replicas > 0

audio_conversion.note: 2000 tokens per minute of audio. 40% customer talking (input), 60% AI responding (output)

gpt_realtime.name: GPT-4 Realtime (Best quality)
gpt_realtime.note: Premium model. Audio: 2000 tokens/min. Text reasoning uses same model rates.

gpt_realtime_mini.name: GPT-4o-mini Realtime (Recommended)
gpt_realtime_mini.note: Best value. Audio: 2000 tokens/min. Excellent quality for most calls.

gpt_4o_realtime.name: GPT-4o Realtime (Better quality)
gpt_4o_realtime.note: Good balance. Audio: 2000 tokens/min. Higher quality than mini.

gpt_4o_mini_realtime.name: GPT-4o Mini Realtime (Fast & economical)
gpt_4o_mini_realtime.note: Alternative mini model. Audio: 2000 tokens/min. Similar to gpt_realtime_mini.

microsoft_365.note: Not counted as new cost if already owned by organization

azure_functions.note: Consumption plan pricing. Generous free tier covers most small/medium deployments.

gpt_5_mini.name: GPT-5-mini (Recommended)
gpt_5_mini.note: Best value for email processing. Excellent quality, low cost.

gpt_5.name: GPT-5 (Best quality)
gpt_5.note: Premium model. Use for complex technical emails requiring highest accuracy.

gpt_4o.name: GPT-4o (Legacy - Better quality)
gpt_4o.note: Previous generation. GPT-5-mini offers better value.

gpt_4o_mini.name: GPT-4o-mini (Legacy - Fast & economical)
gpt_4o_mini.note: Previous generation. GPT-5-mini is newer and recommended.

tokens.note: Base = email content + system prompt. RAG adds retrieved manual context (~1,125 words â‰ˆ 2-3 pages). Output = AI response.

operating_hours.note: Business hours option reduces polling by 68%, significant cost savings for low-volume scenarios.
